message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product. I'm looking to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of the product you're selling. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $120.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I've taken your counteroffer into consideration and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $140.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product.
I'm glad we're continuing the negotiation, Bob. I've thought about your latest offer and I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. I'm now offering the product to you for $145.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $140 for the product.
I'm still open to finding a mutually beneficial price, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment to $142.50. This is my best offer so far, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $140 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to $142. I'm hoping this is the final offer that works for both of us.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in trying to find a mutually agreeable price. I would like to counter with an offer of $140 for the product.
